report.title: Nice Buzz
report.author: Aleister
report.bodytext: T 7:25 PM /n /n Took 4 10 mg morphine sulphate pentahydrate and chewed them (effective 7,5 mg x 4 = 30 mg of morphine) /n /n 7:40 PM /n feel a little drowsy. /n /n 7:50 PM /n drowsier, a feeling of detachment. /n /n 7:55 PM /n funny feeling. /n /n 7:28 PM /n feel happy, smiling, slightly 'cosy'and warm. enjoyment. nice. /n /n 7:45 PM /n serene detachment, happiness /n /n 10:05 PM /n 2 Lorazepam 10mg
